title: Can I go to a university in America with low grades? - Quora

response.answer_text: I assume you are from outside the U.S. The answer to your question is yes, you can go to a university with poor grades. There are a few paths if you are in America. You can score well on your SAT scores, or you can go to Community College and get good grades for a year or two (two is better than one). You could probably attend a community college as a foreign student, though I don’t know about that for sure. Perhaps the best thing about the U.S. Education system is the fact that we allow people to do poorly, and still come back and get a great education.
